H0.text: What, generally, is the par on a 300 yard golf hole. 3

H1.text: What, generally, is the par on a 300 yard golf hole. 5

H2.text: What, generally, is the par on a 300 yard golf hole. 6

H3.text: What, generally, is the par on a 300 yard golf hole. 4

A4.text: par-4 holes will be 240–490 yards (220–450 m)

A5.text: par-3 holes for men will be under 260 yards (240 m) from the tee to the green
